subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki was 4 for 5 and the Mariners pounded out 17 hits while Felix Hernandez, the reigning American League Cy Young Award winner, pitched seven strong innings.
snippet: Ichiro Suzuki was 4 for 5 and the Mariners pounded out 17 hits while Felix Hernandez, the reigning American League Cy Young Award winner, pitched seven strong innings.
